Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Directs the state civil service commission to amend the sick leave accrual rates for state employees designated managerial or confidential
Summary: Directs the state civil service commission to amend the sick leave accrual rates for state employees designated managerial or confidential to be credited with sick leave at the rate of 13 days per year.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the state civil service commission to amend the sick leave accrual rates for state employees designated managerial or confidential
